values:
If you read this, even if i don't speak to you often, you must post a memory of me.
It can be anything you want, it can be good or bad, just so long as it happened.
Then post this to your journal. See what people remember about you....
http://bad-always-wins.livejournal.com/17215.html

What type of weather are you?

Sunshine

You are sunshine. Awww. Warm, bright, without you people get

Click Here to Take This Quiz
Brought to you by YouThink.com quizzes and personality tests.
http://bad-always-wins.livejournal.com/16971.html

So yeah everythings going good

I'm turning 16 next week and i'm having a party so anyone who may read this that i know is invited oh yeah its the 12th around 6

Umm districts are next saturday and i'm running >:p i really dont wanna run it but whatever i might do well


Uhh yeah thats about it so maybe i'll update this thing like sometime in the near future

Sorry for not keeping up i know i'm so interesting
http://bad-always-wins.livejournal.com/16686.html

Went to Ross' house today and it was a lot of fun...i love just being with him...hes so sweet and cute and i love him sooo much

Tomorrow is his party and that should be fun too...

Mrs. Duttons class is gunna be kinda hard but i think if i stay organized i'll be ok

Mrs. Gahagan is a wench she gave nadeau a pm today which totally sucks even tho it didnt happen to me

Mr. Nick seems wicked cool and intro should be fun

Mrs. Grimshaw is easily my favorite teacher already so i think trig should be pretty fun too

Well I've written enough so yeah I think i'm done :)
http://bad-always-wins.livejournal.com/16451.html

Everythings good right now

Classes changed and i'm excited for them except for duttons, shes like 10 ms fiores, oh well i'm up for a challenge

So yeah Ross and I are good except hes being a punk and teasing me right now but thats alright i'll let it go cuz hes cute

Had a snow day today and it was kinda boring oh well...

Wish i could type but i cant so i'm done
http://bad-always-wins.livejournal.com/16321.html

Uhh yeah this weekend was alright 

Friday night i got my pics for my portfolio, i didnt like most of them in fact i only actually like 1 but whatever, my agent lady says i have a lot of talent and wants to send me to this Elite place in New York...I guess its one of the top agency's in the world so that could be fun...Uhh then i went to Ross' that was fun we just hung out and ate and listened to Brett tell stories...

Ross came over yesterday and we studied for french and had tacos and it was fun then my dad came home and we watched white chicks..its a funny movie

Today i woke up around noon and helped my dad shovel the house out and after i just kinda layed around and fell asleep it was kinda boring but whatever

tomorrow is our last finals and their my easy ones which is good....i get to go home early and me hahnna and nick are gunna make snowmen with boobies....should be a good time

So yeah i'm bored tired and i have a headache...so i'm out
http://bad-always-wins.livejournal.com/15948.html

Yeah so finals are tomorrow and i'm absolutely ecstatic to be getting out of Miss Fiore's class, I'm gunna miss her stories tho...not the work

Uhh yeah i had a track meet last night and i didnt really run and i'm kinda bummed that i didnt but oh well such is life....

I'm goin to get my pics for my portfolio tomorrow, i really wanna see how they came out...hopefully i dont look too goofy with all the make up that i had on....uhh yeah i'm basically out of stuff to say so yeah i think i'm done
http://bad-always-wins.livejournal.com/15769.html

So yeah I've been sick for the past couple of days and i've had to stay home which kinda sucked accept i got to sleep like alot which as anyone who really knows me knows i absolutetly love but i missed all my buddies ((tear))...

Uhh yeah everything with me and Ross is really good right now and i cant wait for the weekend so i can hang out with my buddies and i get to see my buddy Jordan at work yay! shes my cool emo friend at work....uhh yeah i dont wanna make up all my work from what i've missed the past couple of days but i get a 3 day weekend to worry about it so i think i'll be ok

Yeah I'm gunna be turning 16 pretty soon...we all know what that means...i'll be driving very very soon i'm soo happy i cant wait but i'm kinda scared to be on the road alone...especially the highways...there are some crazy people out there...and alot of them are my friends hahah jk jk lol guys lyz

wow i need to lay off the medicine

ARG i'm like sooo bored you have no idea my idea of fun right now would be like jumping around in the snow with my underwear on not really but yano that would be pretty fun...i might just have to try that....

Uhh i think i'm out of things to say cuz i cant think of anything else so yeah i'm done...

later
http://bad-always-wins.livejournal.com/15557.html

good day, good night good weekend 

goodbye
http://bad-always-wins.livejournal.com/15181.html

Yeah I'm bored and tired....I had a track meet tonight and it was fun...I finally cleared 4'2" in the high jump...not bad for the 3rd time i've done it...uhh yeah i dont know what else to write....the way home was awesome i love just sitting on the bus with Ross.,..hes so comforting and its so easy for me to just lay there and fall asleep or just talk with him....its great...so yeah like i said i'm tired so i think i'm gunna go lay down or wait for Ross to come on.....later bitches
http://bad-always-wins.livejournal.com/15078.html

This journal entry is dedicated to Hahnna Elizabeth Fahey and all the stupid stuff she says...I will now demonstrate with a few of her very own words....

"Wow! my mom moved the computer into Jakes room and theres like no heat!...I'm freezing! My nipples are like icicles hanging from a house!!!!"

-What are those animals that are orange and have black stripes??

-Tigers?

-OH YEAH!

-I heard something in my wall...Oh my god what if its a rat? They eat people!!!!

-Yeah only sewer rats eat people

-Yeah and I dont wanna die!

-Hahnna you dont have sewers

-Oh yeah

and last but definately not least....

- ok i dont't get it!! why is Jessica Simpson getting paid for all the stupid things she says?  i mean that buffalo wing thing was soooo mine way befor she said it, i mean shouldnt i be getting paid ??

-ya hahnna you should kill her

- omg thats such a good idea ill get a fork and a popsicle stick and ill stab her in the back with the fork and stick the popsicle stick up her nose to make her look like a moron. Then i'll steal all her money and put a copy right on the buffalo wing saying.

-yaaaa okay Hahnna you do that.....
http://bad-always-wins.livejournal.com/14839.html

bored kinda tired

very happy....

Tomorrows New Years Eve and that should be fun, i'm excited

so yeah i'm done
http://bad-always-wins.livejournal.com/14534.html
yeah so i'm trying out a new format for this sucka....lemme know what you think about it...its not gunna change anything but i just like hearing from people so yeah later
http://bad-always-wins.livejournal.com/14284.html

SEX

now that i've got your attention things are great with me and Ross and i'm happy

I talked to hahnna today and that was fun i miss her ((tear)) its hard not seeing your best buddy for like a year

OMG speaking of year in like 4 days it'll be 2005 how cool is that...yano when we're older and telling our kids about 1998 and 99 they'll be thinking "Wow their soo old, they know what the 1900's were like. They had to use an oven to make their food, that must have taken like 15 minutes"

But anyway i'm done, i've made myself look like a big enough loser already...not enough of you know the real me to know who i really am...a nerd but anyway peace out bitches
http://bad-always-wins.livejournal.com/13998.html

So today was Christmas..what a merry one it was...spent it with like my entire family...something i havent done since like 5th grade....plus i got to see my parents getting along which really made me happy...I got everything i wanted and got to spend it with my favorite people, with acception with a few, oh well whatever

Tomorrow i'm going to the mall to return a few things and pick up some new ones and i think me and ross are gunna hang out..that makes me happy i miss him

SO yeah thats about it 

I'll think abou keeping this thing more updated but whatever i'll do what i damn well please cuz its mine not yours so got bite a hot dog

Later
http://bad-always-wins.livejournal.com/13573.html
this is updated dont feel like typing and ross is telling me to update this mother f***er so yeah done
http://bad-always-wins.livejournal.com/13501.html

Last night was the Holiday Ball..it was fun i guess i dunno i wasnt really in the mood for it but whatever i was with Ross and i was happy..

So Ross Hahnna and John were supposed to come over after but just Ross ended up coming and i think it worked out for the better i like just spending time with him..anyway he left around 11 and i went to bed

Woke up and took a shower this morning and i had to wash my hair twice to get all the gunk out...and i think it still needs to be washed again...

Well i'm out


-Later
http://bad-always-wins.livejournal.com/13116.html

Yeah so I got yelled at to update this beast...so i am

Track today was fun except for weight room i think i pulled my shoulder out but hey whatever it happens....came home and Ross came over and we hung out for a while and it was fun

So yeah I'm tired and i have to work at 1030 tomorrow so yeah i'll hit this back yesterday

Kinda short but oh well
http://bad-always-wins.livejournal.com/12994.html

Ugh I dont fee like dealing with anything i'm tired and very sore...i want to cry when i climb stairs but thats ok no pain no gain right?

Printed out my Fiore paper at school this morning and i almost got a detention cuz my fat ass french teacher said i was late even though the fucking music was still on...then he had the gall to ask if i got a detention or not and was glad to know that i didnt...wtf who does that? 

Anyway i went to the doctors to get a physical to find that it was cancelled so i missed track and that kinda pissed me off too...and i have a dentists appt. tomorrow night so i'm gunna miss track again which blows...

Uh i'm still tired and i dont feel well so i'm gunna leave
http://bad-always-wins.livejournal.com/12760.html

Today we have to go to school tomorrow and it sucks...i dont wanna go back to school but i want track to start...for the simple reasons that i have the coolest outfit planned and i like to run...


Anyway hung out with Ross friday and that was soo much fun we sat in my room on my bed with the door shut just talking and listening to music for like hours..it was great and i love hanging out with him

Saturday i got my dress for the winter ball and its soo cute...well i think its cute and it looks good on me and if you dont like it you can go bite a hot dog

ok out
http://bad-always-wins.livejournal.com/12319.html

So today was Thanksgiving...it was good...the food was awesome 

There was no pumpkin pie tho...such a dissappointment...oh well theirs always tomorrow 

So yeah i'm done later
http://bad-always-wins.livejournal.com/12285.html

Yeah so Thanksgivings tomorrow...i'm pretty excited 
i just want the pumpkin pie and cranberry sauce...oh yeah and some turkey too

I worked today and that was alright i suppose...

Hung out with Ross last night and even tho it wasnt very long it was fun like always...cant wait till Friday i think we're gunna hang out again 

Yano what bugs me?? if you dont i'm gunna tell you
It bugs me when people have a problem with you and dont confront you with it...so if anyone has a problem with me come to me about it...dont say stuff behind my back its stupid and juvenile

Anyway i'm done..just thought i'd update this beast to keep those who are interested in whats going on with me informed

I'm off faster than a dress on prom night...PEACE
http://bad-always-wins.livejournal.com/11944.html

So yeah yesterday me and Ross spent the entire day toghether...it was awesome...we went to the paladium around 11 stayed for a few bands then went to grab something to eat, then came back to watch aarons band and went to get more to eat...then we came back to my house and hung out and just talked about stuff....This is why i'm writing my journal

We were talking about whats happened in our past and stuff and while we were broken up was the main subject, the friendly side then the not talking stage then our getting back together...funny thing is what takes most people months, takes us weeks...like when Ross first started talking to me like best friends again i was soo happy, i was upset cuz i had found out he was hanging out with brittany but i soon got over that...I remember that saturday that i found out that he hung out with brittany we had talked for like 2 hours that night and it was just like old times again and i was soo happy but then i remembered we were just friends and he was with her....so that monday rolls around and i find out their officially together...needless to say i was shocked and hurt soo much but the funny thing is that while he was with her he would talk to me more...like the very next day he asked me to go to bretts soccer game but i could only stay for a little while...even though i was only there for maybe half an hour it was amazing...he held my hand and put his arm around me and i was soo happy...anyway thursday rolls around and some stuff happened that made me very happy, and on friday night ross and i hung out...i guess thats when you could say we got back together....all of this happened within one week...see what i mean...anyway i'm soooo happy with him and i'm soo thankful we're back together and honestly its like nothing has changed...so yeah i've said my peace thank you for listening
http://bad-always-wins.livejournal.com/11679.html

Ugh went to the dentist today...I swear their like terrorists of your mouth...i found out i have 3 cavities which are totally not my fault its cuz my dumb ceilents are breaking down in my mouth...bad!

So yeah i swear my dental hygenist was trying to hurt me i can only imagine what was going on in her head at the time..."Does this hurt?? No, well let me shove my POINTY STICK up your tooth some more and rip it out of your mouth, that works."

Anyway things are alright...I GOT MY FIRST B IN HISTORY TODAY...god i never thought i'd be excited to get a B...but yeah i'm out of here cuz i dont feel like writing in this anymore
http://bad-always-wins.livejournal.com/11313.html

So yeah havent updated this thing in like forever...i've been busy yano goin places seeing people doin' things...you know how i role...so this has been a fairly good week overall except for the fucking comment on the whatever date it was like last friday whoever you are you have no balls and thats all i have to say on that matter...oh yeah Fiore pants gave me a fucking 79!!!! >:0

anyway hung out with Ross today he's great and i love him..Brett asked us when we were getting married...i got a kick out of that..and Ross stuck snow down my pants totally didnt dig that but oh well i got in his pants lol...((I wore them while mine were drying you sickos))

So i came home and did homework till about nine which kinda sucked but hey i'm gunna get a good grade hopefully oh well i'm tired and i kinda hate updating this thing...its only good for absolutely nothing so yeah i'm out
http://bad-always-wins.livejournal.com/11019.html
If you could kill one person without any consequences who would it be?
http://bad-always-wins.livejournal.com/11004.html

Ok so yeah I'm gunna vent right now cuz a certain someone said a certain something to a certain someone else today that was totally inappropriate...and yano what Brittany your just mad cuz Ross came back to me and he doesnt like you anymore get over it...

It also pisses me off when people like get a better position in something whether it be academecly or athletecly when they dont even deserve it...there are so many other better people that have worked hard and are still stuck in this menial position cuz the jackasses who dont deserve to be there are taking their spot....

Anyway it was a good week i just had to get that off my chest

Oh yeah before i forget...whoever started the shit with Ross using me just cuz we're not officially together is complete and total crap...that pisses me off so much..you know who you are and you know its not true

So yeah i'm tired and dont fiend to type this thing anymore
http://bad-always-wins.livejournal.com/10682.html

yeah so this past thursday was the concert...IT WAS FUCKING AWESOME...

I love greenday they put on the best show ever...anyway we had kinda sucky seats and my dad snuck us down practically to the floor for nfg but we had to leave so we just went one level up the seats were awesome....anyway i screamed so much for them that i lost my voice and now my throat is like killing me which totally sucks cuz tomorrow is halloween oh well maybe it'll be back by tomorrow...

Last night i worked but i got out at like 8 and hahnna and john walked to get me and on our way home ross got dropped off and we watched eurotrip...its a great movie soo funny they left around 11 and i went to bed shortly after...i woke up at 1230 cuz i've been lacking sleep Ross called and woke me up...it made me happy and now i'm writing this beast so yeah...

Tomorrow should be fun i want candy...lots of chocolate is what i'm hoping for

So yeah i'm out of things to write so i'll hit this thing back later..

PEACE
http://bad-always-wins.livejournal.com/10454.html

Today i went to Ross' 

It was awesome...we hung out and skated and ross landed a fakie variable kickflip and i'm proud of him for it...then we went and hugn out some more and watched a cartoon made by kyle "curminator" it was soo funny and yet soo random at the same time...then we ate and hung out with brett...ross and brett started like wrestling cuz mrs willand went to take kyle to ccd and they took out mini hockey sticks and pvc pipe...i was scared someone was gunna get hurt...but anyway 

I had a great time with him and i'm so happy that we're like coming back to eachother...we're good for eachother and we always have soo much fun together even if we did absolutely nothing...i remember over the summer we went to 6 flags and waited in line for superman for like half an hour and honestly i had more fun waiting in line with him than on the ride lol

so yeah i'm wicked tired and i dont fiend to type to something thats not really gunna talk back so i'm out like a fat kid in dodgeball
PEACE
http://bad-always-wins.livejournal.com/10151.html

Yeah so today is boring as hell but thats ok cuz yesterday was simply amazing

Ross came over and we hung out for a few hours...it was great i had a lot of fun..it kinda sucks that i had to work tho cuz then we coulda hung out for like another hour....i know it doesnt sound like much but every minute with him is awesome

So yeah i went to work at like four and JORDAN was there...i was excited but she left like 10 minutes later and i wanted to cry lol...we closed early so we could watch the game and i was home alone from like 830 till like 4 or so in the morning..it was cool but kinda scary so i ordered pizza..mr parket delivered it and he said hi..i said hi back and i gave him like a dollar tip..its all i had

I watched the game kinda but i was like yelling at fricken manny cuz he sucks hardcore but whatever then i talked to my aunt jacquie...shes awesome i miss her...and then i talked to my baby for like 3 hours and i went to bed at like 3

and i woke up today and did absolutely nothing...oh well
http://bad-always-wins.livejournal.com/9941.html

Tonight was the homecoming dance and the bon fire...i had a great time

Ross and Hahnna came over before the dance and that was cool...we went to the bonfire which was hott...like litterally burn your eyelashes hott which was nice cuz it was effing cold...it rained like half way thru but it like it stopped 10 minutes later and it was even colder after that but then again the fire was nice and warm...


So at 7 we went up to the dance and i had an awesome time...i was with Ross dancing like the whole time and it was great i had the best time with him...ahh he gives me this look and it gives me the chills...i love that about him hes jsut such a great person and i love him and he makes me soo happy

yeah i went up to him and brittany was like right behind him and when i went up to him she like left...it was funny

But yeah i'm tired and i really dont have much else to say so yeah bye
http://bad-always-wins.livejournal.com/9639.html

Last night me and hahnna went shopping and it was fun..i got a cool jacket and shoes and shirt and a headband...their all cute i like them very much...i'm excited for the concert...i'm so ready to see greenday and nfg and sc i've dropped enough dough on it...yeah

Today kinda sucks its rainy and cold and i cant really type right now cuz my fingers are frozen and its kinda painful to move them with control....but oh well i have nothing better to do "i'm as fake as a widows smile"....i love that song ((for those of you that dont know...thats not the name of the song))

i wanna see senses fail...i also wanna go to the exposure tour but i just dont know if i have the money to right now...i mean i've spent probably close to 200 bucks on this concert and i really want to get a car as soon as i can...ugh i need to work more lol or maybe get a better job that pays more..thatd be nice...oh well

Yeah so i'm out faster than a fat kid in dodgeball

-Peace
http://bad-always-wins.livejournal.com/9257.html

Yeah so i'm updating this thing cuz Ross tole me to and since Ross is that cool thats what i'm doing

This weekend was pretty cool 

Friday was the party it was pretty cool and hahnna and kelsey slept over and we talked and it was fun...Ross was there and i was excited..hes awesome and i love him...

Saturday me and hahnna cleanded up my house which took a whole of maybe 20 minutes then we skated down to zimmies and ate food cuz we're fat...then we came back and made red sox thingys and hung out

Today i got up at like 1140 and showered and hung out till about 330 and went shopping with ross cuz he wanted emo kid pants but he couldnt really find them so we went back to his house which was fun...Bretts funny

SO yeah me and hahnna are going shopping tomorrow for the concert and i'm excited for both

So yeah i dont wanna write anymore i'm talking to my baby i'll hit this thing like tomorrow the day after or whenever i feel like it
http://bad-always-wins.livejournal.com/9126.html

Fuck everyone god i hate everything right now

My dad totally sucks...hes cool and everything when hes SOBER...once you put a couple of drinks in him he turns into a total jackass oh my god i fucking hate listening to him and my sister bicker back and forth...ugh its just soo frustrating and i fucking hate everything about my family

Sometimes i wish i was someone different...thatd be nice you have no idea how bad i just wish i had a normal family or atleast a normal dad i'm soo sick of this bullshit that is my life its like if one things going good something always has to go wrong

Oh well dont listen to me i'm just pissing and moaning cuz i'm a spoiled little brat and i'm just having a bad night

Yeah so whatever

I just wasted 2 minutes of your precious life...kinda sucks...dont you wish you spent it doing something better?
http://bad-always-wins.livejournal.com/8723.html

Soo what to say what to say

Hahnna's birthday party is friday night thats cool...if anyone would like to join find me at school and if i like you enough maybe i'll give you an invitation lol ((its at my house))

Uhh yeah me and Ross have been kinda back to normal...i really like that he makes me soo happy...amazing how much can change in as little as 3 weeks..seems like a long time but in the scheme of things its like a blink of an eye...

Schools been ok..i'm actually almost getting a b in fiores that really makes me happy and my algebra grades alright but i know i can do better....hmm took the psats today...that was an experience and a half...i think i did alright i suppose we'll see

Yeah well i guess thats all i have to say...not much else going on...but i'm really happy and now i'm eating like crazy which makes me not happy but whatever its all good i'm kinda sleepy too now but yeah uhhh i'll hit this beast back later
http://bad-always-wins.livejournal.com/8651.html

What Makes You Sexy? by eva71

Gender

http://bad-always-wins.livejournal.com/8222.html

This weekend was great...

Friday night me and hahnna went to zimmys and then went swimming after...then i went to Ross'...i didnt know what to expect and i was really nervous cuz it was the first time we hung out since we broke up..but i had a great time with him and we basically worked things out between ourselves and now i think things are gunna be ok which really makes me happy 

Saturday i worked but it wasnt that bad...it was really busy then slowed down the randomly got busy again but i was out of there by like 815 and came home and did my fiore essay till like 11 at which point my computer decided to take a dump and stop working so i had to restore it which didnt work and its still kinda fucked but it works so yeah

Today i had to work till 4 which was alright and then Ross came over and we hung out and listened to music and talked and stuff...it was great and i missed hanging out with him soo much so yeah he went home at about 10 and then i had a huge piece of black forest cake cuz i was starving....i worked hard tonight; ) hehe...so yeah now i'm updating this beast 

Oh yeah My friend parm is really cool all you girls out there should check him out....
http://bad-always-wins.livejournal.com/8064.html

I'm dedicating this journal entry to the one and only Glenn Dominetre Swanson

He is the best friend that any one could ever ask for...hes goofy hes fun hes smart and hes cute...best of all hes hardcore and for an emo girl like me that makes me smile....anyway you guys should really check him out especially all you emo/pun/hardcore girls out ther...Jordan that means you lol ok i'm done bye now
http://bad-always-wins.livejournal.com/7876.html

Today totally kicked ass and when i say kicked ass i meant blew harder than a bulemic after thanksgiving dinner....

Lets see i wore a skirt and i felt pretty today and lunch was good cuz me and hahnna are wicked mean together but we have a good time i guess..French was boring and i always get restless in that class but whatever its all good...The only good thing that came out of today was i only have an essay in history to do and thats not due till like tuesday so i probably wont start worrying about it till like thursday or sunday

I came home and talked to Ross which was cool but then i foudn out hes going out with brittany UGH to the infinate power...wow just wow is all i have to say about that...me and hahnna went to the jv game and i guess they won but i had to go to work which blew so much cuz it was sooo sooo sooo slow and my back was killing me and my boss scares me hes like a molester or something but i'm not gunna tell my dad or anyone cuz i need the money and i really dont see him that often....Ugh that dude pisses me off soo much he called me mary and he knows my fucking name is megan and his eyes their so empty and cold and just scary....Oh and i'm fucking breaking out like crazy...thats what i get for working in a grease pit i guess tho

Anyway i came home and took a shower which was nice cuz i was cold and i came up with the cutest outfit tomorrow i'm proud of myself and i painted my nails but i'm neglecting to do my homework...oh well i have tutorial tomorrow so i can take care of it then

Thats about all i have to say...oh wait i came up with this wicked cool line thing in the shower...

First time you break my heart...Shame on you
Second time you break my heart...Shame on me
Third time you break my heart...Well thats just unacceptable
http://bad-always-wins.livejournal.com/7552.html

Ugh yet another weekend drenched in homework and yet I still Refuse to do it..i could have saved myself so much grief and just done it when it was assigned like tuesday but i'm a procrastinator and i dont like to do that so now i'm screwed again...i swear i'm bound to fail that class...

Anyway this weekend has been kinda ok so far i guess....uhh last night me hahnna and nick went to go see the forgotten...((dont waste you money wait till it comes out on dvd or something)) but it was a good time we got lost on rte 20 on our way there and probably went a good half an hour out of our way...it was funny....then i came home and got bad news but i'm trying not to think about it so yeah

Then i woke up at 8 this morning and went to king richards fair and that was cool weird but cool i learned a cool chant too...its my subject yeah then we came home and went to the mall which was kinda boring but whatever...then i came home and ate and it was gross so i went up and "did my homework" but i was really talking to Ross...that was the best thing i've done this weekend...he makes me so happy and i just wish things could be like they were before ugh i hate how one stupid decision can just change everything i hate change...oh well i guess i just have to be strong and try to pretend everythings alright like i have been i just really really miss him...hes a great guy and no matter what i say i love him to death and always will he means so much to me....

But yeah i have to work tomorrow and do all the rest of my homework which sucks but i'll get over it...its not the worst thing that could happen right?
http://bad-always-wins.livejournal.com/7280.html

Wow what a crazy past few weeks its been...

I think i've learned more about love and loss more in these past few weeks than i have in my entire life...just when you things cant get any worse i open my big mouth and things get a bazillion times worse...but i'm trying to behave myself and i think i'm doing a good job haha for the whole day that i've been trying....

I've also learned more about a certain person and how he truely views me now and honestly it sucks but its not his fault, i'm the one that made him feel that way so i guess i really cant blame anyone...It just really sucks knowing that im the cause of such a catostrophe and drove him to another girl, whom i dont approve of much anyway....no offense to her but he can do much better i know he can....and i'm not including myself in this cuz i'm not very good right now i guess...

Anyway work was cool today it was really slow but me and kim talked and shes really cool....judging people isnt cool either cuz i thought she was mean but once you talk to her shes really nice and cool to talk to...i'm finding alot of people are like that...if you open yourself up a little bit to someone and just talk they turn out to be really cool...I think works really helping me to realize that which is cool cuz i'm like scared of people

Friday i slept over hahnnas house and that was fun..we watched mean girls and made fun of a certain someone (hint:its not a guy)...i dont think i've laughed so much about one thing in ages. Saturday we woke up and i talked to Ross...not the best conversation i've had and i kinda wished it hadnt happened (my life story at this point. Anyway after that i had to go to work which was ok but it was wicked busy and i burnt myself like 20 times. After work i came home and hahnna was just getting there as i was walking down the hill. So i showered and we got ready to go out with nunzi and zach for the night. After we were ready john showed up at like 5:15. Zach was supposed to show up around the same time but he didnt call till like 6 so we didnt end up going to the movies like we were planning. Instead he came and got us and we went to uncle sams got food went back to his house and just hung out and stuff. It was fun even though we didnt do much. Anyway i got home around 11 and waited for ross to come on but he signed off cuz he hates me...so i went to bed at like 130

Today i woke up at like 1030 and went to the coffee hopp in oxford (its that new little diner place) for breakfast. Its a cute little place and they have really good bagels. After that we went to home depot for insulation for sharons house i dunno it was gay...then we came home and i was tired so i slept till like 3 talked to ross and got depressed. So then i just hung around the house and watched movies till around like 530 when glenn and sam showed up...they were here for about an hour and then jake and harry showed up..after that we went to talk to staci when danielle called and we met her at the high school and then we went and talked to seth and i came home...

I have realized something this weekend and i think its pretty important so i'm gunna share...other people make me feel so much better...Ross makes me feel terrible and i'm glad that i have friends that make me laugh and make me feel like i'm something important..I just dont understand him..he'd rather have a girl that has nothing on me (not trying to sound cocky but people have told me this) than me..we had so much and hes just like dropping me like it was nothing...i know i messed up and i wanna make it right hes the one that doesnt want to be with me and i just dont get it i must be the biggest fool for letting him do this....

How is it possible for one person to just forget about everything good that they had in a relationship over a stupid mistake? It makes no sense to me...I also dont understand how you can say you love someone but break up with them after they tell you the truth when others tell you not to say anything in the first place and then go after some other chick. It fucking sucks and everything sucks

But i'm better than this i know i am. I'm capable of being the person i once was and i dont need him. But then again my heart and my mind are having a battle in my body its a miracle that i have combusted yet. My heart tells me you love him and you wanna be with him but my head says what the fuck megan your better than this...you dont need a person that makes you feel like crap everyday. They're both right i just have to figure out which one to go with cuz right now i'm so confused. I know i love him or else it wouldnt be like this..it would have been like everyother break up i've had. It woulda been like goodbye talk to you in 6 months or the next time i dont feel like avoiding you. But this time i really miss him. I feel so used tho at the same time. Like so much can change about a person in two weeks NO FUCKING WAY IS THAT POSSIBLE. 

You also cant say you forgive a person without accepting what they've done first. It doesnt mean that what they've done is ok or that you should congradulate them for it, it just means that your wiling to work past it and try to forget about it. 

I was a deep believer in love until all this happened. He ruined love for me. I truely and honestly loved him with all my heart and i never stopped. I just made a stupid mistake and i dont deserve what i've gotten. Him on the other hand, he says he loves me but doesnt wanna be with me and he likes another girl and says that i've change in 2 fucking weeks to reitterate my point THERE IS NO WAY POSSIBLE A PERSON THAT YOU LOVE CAN CHANGE SO MUCH YOU DONT WANNA BE WITH THEM IN JUST 2 WEEKS and then says that we were too serious, which i totally agree with but i mean whatever things can change. 

Like i said i'm a fool for even trying to be with him. I should know better that he doesnt love me like he used to cuz i mean i changed sooo much. Whatever i deserve better than a guy who doesnt wanna be with me cuz of a fucking mistake even tho he tells me he loves me so much and wants to be with me. 

Do you still follow?

People are strange and complicated animals and i think i've found the most complicated of the bunch. He says that if he were in my position he wouldnt have done what i did but i think he would have done the same exact thing and probably would have told me but the same way i told him. And yano what i would understand and be willing to work it out. Well anyway i'm kinda out of stuff to say. If i have more i'll def hit this mofo back

-Meg
